title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and Docker-like UX.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library that wraps the Ollama HTTP API with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama service.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-user support and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Unofficial Nim client for Ollama generated directly from the OpenAPI spec.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that combines Ollama with session memory and parameter sliders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete and summarization using Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service for CI pipelines to run LLM-based tests.

title: ollama-rag-qa-bot
summary: End-to-end retrieval QA bot using Ollama embeddings, Weaviate vector DB and Chainlit UI.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork that adds Ollama as a backend option alongside llama.cpp and others.
